remarks: The vector space component of a normed complex vector space is an ordered pair of the underlying group and a scalar product.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvvop.1 $e |- W = ( 1st ` U ) $.
nvvop.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvvop.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvvop $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> W = <. G , S >. ) $.
